Class Gateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stevens.surehouse.Gateway
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class Gateway
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representation of a Gateway instance.

               java.lang.String query,
               java.lang.String name)
        Instantiate a new instance of a Gateway class.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID associated to this Gateway.
        ip - The IP address of where this gateway is located.
        query - The query parameters of the gateway.
        name - The name of the gateway.
